data.persona: I am the most powerful man in the country. I like that people fear me. I will destroy all that oppose me.
data.description:
You are in the Courtyard exterior.
Paths as well as vines, fountains, and sitting areas are decoratively placed through out the courtyard. It's a place where people are welcome and arrive to enter the castle of the court.
The servant is here.

You are carrying a scepter, and wearing a cape.

data.short_motivation: I am showing a gesture of pardon to the servant
data.mid_motivation: I have pardoned him and will not punish him for his crimes
data.long_motivation: I want my subjects to know what it takes to receive a royal pardon
